Adamantite ore is used with six coal to smelt adamantite bars. Smelting an adamantite bar gives 37.5 Smithing experience.

Item ID449

Adamantite ore can be mined at level 70 Mining providing 95 Mining experience. After an adamantite rock is mined, it will take four minutes until it reappears. Adamantite ore is used with six coal to smelt adamantite bars. Smelting an adamantite bar gives 37.5 Smithing experience.

Wearing either superior mining gloves or expert mining gloves while mining an adamantite rock grants a 16.66% chance for the rock to not deplete upon mining an adamantite ore, allowing you to mine an additional ore before depleting.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Although adamant is synonymous with hard, immovable, or stubborn, adamant and similar words like adamantite, adamantine (e.g. Virgil on the gate of Tartarus), and adamantium (e.g. Marvel Comics's Wolverine's skeleton) refer to any especially hard substance, whether composed of diamond, some other gemstone, or some type of metal. Both adamant and diamond derive from the Greek word ἀδάμας (adamās), meaning "untameable".
  • Adamantite ore weighs more than other smithing ores, weighing 2.721kg rather than the usual 2.267kg. Mithril ore also does not follow this trend.

rawContent: {{External|rsc|rs}} {{Otheruses|the ore|the rock it's extracted from|Adamantite rock}} {{HasMMG|Mining adamantite ore}} {{Infobox Item |name = Adamantite ore |image = [[File:Adamantite ore.png]] |release = [[4 January]] [[2001]] |update = Runescape beta is now online! |members = No |quest = No |tradeable = Yes |placeholder = Yes |equipable = No |stackable = No |noteable = Yes |destroy = Drop |examine = This needs refining. |value = 400 |weight = 2.721 |exchange = Yes |id = 449 }} [[File:Adamantite ore detail.png|left|130px]] '''Adamantite ore''' can be mined at level 70 [[Mining]] providing 95 Mining experience. After an [[adamantite rock]] is mined, it will take four minutes until it reappears. Adamantite ore is used with six [[coal]] to smelt [[adamantite bar|adamantite bars]]. Smelting an adamantite bar gives 37.5 [[Smithing]] experience. Wearing either [[superior mining gloves]] or [[expert mining gloves]] while mining an adamantite rock grants a 16.66% chance for the rock to not deplete upon mining an adamantite ore, allowing you to mine an additional ore before depleting. ==Mining Info== {{Mining info |name = Adamantite Rock |level = 70 |xp = 95 |rock = [[Adamantite Rock]] |tool = [[Pickaxe]] |time = 4 minutes }} ==Products== {{Uses material list|Adamantite ore}} ==Locations== {{Main|Adamantite rock}} ==Item sources== {{Drop sources|Adamantite ore}} ===Shop locations=== {{Store locations list|Adamantite ore}} ==Trivia== *Although adamant is synonymous with hard, immovable, or stubborn, ''{{wp|adamant}}'' and similar words like ''adamantite'', ''{{wp|adamantine}}'' (e.g. {{wp|Tartarus#Roman_mythology|Virgil on the gate of Tartarus}}), and ''{{wp|adamantium}}'' (e.g. {{WP|Marvel Comics|Marvel Comics's}} {{wp|Wolverine (character)|Wolverine's}} skeleton) refer to any especially hard substance, whether composed of diamond, some other gemstone, or some type of metal. Both ''adamant'' and diamond derive from the Greek word [[wiktionary:ἀδάμας#Ancient_Greek|''ἀδάμας'']] (''adamās''), meaning "untameable". *Adamantite ore weighs more than other smithing ores, weighing 2.721kg rather than the usual 2.267kg. [[Mithril ore]] also does not follow this trend. {{Adamant equipment}} {{Mining}} [[Category:Ores]] [[Category:Needs skilling success chart]]
